label: 荘園 整理令
本: Capital and Countryside in Japan, 300-1180:  Japanese Historians Interpreted in English . Cornell University East Asia Program . 2006
見出し読み: しょうえんせいりれい
説明文: estate-limiting regulations, the first of which were issued in 902, during the Engi era. Subsequent regulations were issued many times during the Heian Period, with those of 1040, 1045, and 1156 considered most important.
